channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Thurlow Park Road SE21 a few yards from Avenue P, 27th September
item.description:
Thurlow Park Road SE21 a few yards from Avenue Park Road junction on the none house number 12 side ie the wooden hoarding side is a green plastic Lambeth road sweeper’s bag bin which is graffiti tagged – picture attached – please forward fixmystreet.com link to your contractor. I recognise Thurlow Park Road comes under Transport for London (TfL) but under the Environmental Protection Act (EPA) Lambeth is still responsible for general street litter / rubbish = Lambeth bin = Lambeth property = Lambeth graffiti to clean. (NB You do not remove graffiti from hoardings – this report is re Lambeth’s street sweeper’s bin being graffiti tagged.) Google Streetview of bin: https://www.google.com/maps/@51.440534,-0.1036551,3a,50.1y,196.43h,90.13t/data=!3m7!1e1!3m5!1sy-UJHwFHgfOSVAI2rwfxHQ!2e0!6shttps:%2F%2Fstreetviewpixels-pa.googleapis.com%2Fv1%2Fthumbnail%3Fcb_client%3Dmaps_sv.tactile%26w%3D900%26h%3D600%26pitch%3D-0.13154394631106925%26panoid%3Dy-UJHwFHgfOSVAI2rwfxHQ%26yaw%3D196.4317846265582!7i16384!8i8192?authuser=0&entry=ttu&g_ep=EgoyMDI1MDkyNC4wIKXMDSoASAFQAw%3D%3D

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Thurlow Park Road, Tulse Hill, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: People urinating on fence, 27th September
item.description:
Multiple people each day urinate on this mostly neglected area that collects rubbish. Today there have been 6. This has been a common occurrence since I moved in 2 years ago.
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Mare Street, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Thurlow Park Road SE21 outside number 10, 27th September
item.description:
Thurlow Park Road SE21 outside number 10 (Thurlow House) is a metal street name board (with the street name plastic vinyl mostly removed) which has been graffiti tagged. Although Thurlow Park Road comes under TfL Lambeth is responsible for all street name boards (and direction signs) so your property = you clean graffiti. Please forward fixmystreet.com link to your contractor for picture.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Thurlow Park Road, Tulse Hill, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Playground fence vandalism, 27th September
item.description:
Reported by a resident “It unfortunately appears the fence of the play park by the swings has again been vandalised again: there are bits on the ground and free access for dogs into the park. I will keep trying to report to Bromley online (via FixMyStreet) but so far only get as far as completing my details, with no option available to submit. “

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Wirral Wood Close, Elmstead, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Yellow safety barrier on pavement, 27th September
item.description:
This barrier was first reported on 1 August and is still there. Have to walk in road to get round it or risk tripping over it. This needs removing urgently please considering how long it has been there.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 70, Hayes Chase, Park Langley, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Overhanging trees blocking pavement, 27th September
item.description:
Trees are very badly overhanging onto the pavement. Average height people cannot pass without bending or moving onto the road. Children and disabled can be hit in the face. Please trim urgently

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Choumert Road, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dumped bags of rubbish in car park, 27th September
item.description:

item.title: Commercial Kitchen Units from Ranya Cafe, 27th September
item.description:
